desc: Artisan Candle & Soap Maker. Local and completely natural products. Making all attempts to be sustainable & ethical, let us try for a plastic free world. Help us be more environmentally friendly. Let us love ourselves and the planet. Based in Berkshire, UK.

layout.text: Hot Dawg. This summer has been a sweaty climate disaster. If you are feeling the heat, think about your pet. Give them a pampering & a cool down with some sustainably made products.
